alert.note: Alert for Caswell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Caswell, south central Pittsylvania and southwestern Halifax Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Milton, or 7 miles east of Providence, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Boston... Turbeville... Milton... Cluster Springs... Blanch... Hamer... and Semora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central North Carolina...and central and south central Virginia.
